clearDescription.message: Clear all of the control bindings so you have a blank workspace

resetLabel.description: Reset the controls to the defaults. Could also be translated as 'default'

resetDescription.message: Reset all of the controls back to their defaults

shiftLeftDescription.message: Move a piece to the left once or hold for autoshift

shiftRightDescription.message: Move a piece to the right once or hold for autoshift

hardDropDescription.message: Drop a piece instantly to the floor. (may act differently or be disabled in some modes)

softDropDescription.message: Velocizza la velocità di un pezzo (potrebbe avere effetti differenti in base alla modalità di gioco)

rotateLeftDescription.message: Ruota un pezzo di 90° in senso antiorario.

rotateRightDescription.message: Ruota un pezzo di 90° in senso orario.

rotateDoubleLabel.description: Could also be referred to as a 'double rotation'

rotateDoubleDescription.message: Ruota un pezzo 180° (potrebbe essere disabilitato in alcune modalità)

holdDescription.message: Send a piece to the hold queue (may be disabled in some modes)

retryLabel.description: You press this bind to restart the game instantly

configPopupHeader.description: Displays as a header on a popup window when you add a control binding

configPopupDescription.message: Premi il tasto che desideri utilizzare per questa azione
configPopupDescription.description: Displays on the popup when you add a control binding
